senses.sense_definition: Capable of being moved to a new place or location.

examples.text: The company is looking for a manager who is <w>relocatable</w> to their overseas branch.
We purchased a <w>relocatable</w> office unit for the construction site.

senses.sense_definition: Capable of being loaded into and executed from different parts of computer memory without error.

examples.text: The compiler generates <w>relocatable</w> code that the linker processes.
This software module is <w>relocatable</w> and can run anywhere in the system memory.

senses.sense_definition: A temporary building or structure that can be dismantled and set up in another location.

examples.text: The school installed two <w>relocatables</w> to accommodate the extra students.
These <w>relocatables</w> serve as temporary offices during the renovation.
